verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
[Verse 1]
I will wait on You, Lord
I will wait on You, Lord
I'm not going anywhere
So I will wait on You, Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[Pre-Chorus]
I'm tearing down this fortress I've built
Nothing would keep us apart
You hold the heavens but never let go of my heart!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
[Chorus 1]
I'm forever Yours!
I'm forever Yours!
Oh, the greatest joy
You'll always be mine
I'm forever Yours!
Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-ooohh
Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-oooohh
I'm forever Yours
Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-ooohh
Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-oooohh
